author: sibkatya
content: Hi everyone, regarding this list of PeerDAS metrics https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1252403418941624532/1256084227926003793, there is now a Lighthouse PeerDAS metrics dashboard in the `ethereum-package`. Not fully implemented yet. Probably, could be helpful for other teams to take a look or compare.  Any feedback or comments are appreciated. You can find the dashboard json [here](https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/blob/main/static_files/grafana-config/dashboards/lighthouse-peerdas-dashboard.json)

author: jimmygchen
content: This is great, I'm already finding it useful. Thanks for this üôè
